Adjust the input audio pitch to match th: Adjust the input audio pitch to match the voice model range.
Adjust the pitch of the audio.
Adjust the speed of the speech. Positive: Passen Sie die Geschwindigkeit der Sprache an. Positive Werte beschleunigen, negative Werte verlangsamen.
Adjust the volume of the Instrumentals.
Adjust the volume of the backing vocals.
Adjust the volume of the vocals.
Adjusts the final volume of the converte: Adjusts the final volume of the converted voice after processing.
Adjusts the input volume before processi: Adjusts the input volume before processing. Prevents clipping or boosts a quiet mic.
Adjusts the volume of the monitor feed,: Adjusts the volume of the monitor feed, independent of the main output.
Amount of extra audio processed to provi: Amount of extra audio processed to provide context to the model. Improves conversion quality at the cost of higher CPU usage.
Apply a soft autotune to your inferences: Apply a soft autotune to your inferences, recommended for singing conversions.
Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Lower: Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Lower values may reduce latency but increase CPU load.
Automatically clean temporary files at r: Temporäre Dateien in regelmäßigen Abständen automatisch bereinigen.
Automatically delete processed files aft: Verarbeitete Dateien nach der Konvertierung automatisch löschen.
Change the pitch of the instrumental.
Wählen Sie eine Sicherungsdatei aus, von der wiederhergestellt werden soll.
Clear Outputs (Deletes all audios in ass: Clear Outputs (Deletes all audios in assets/audios)
Convert text to speech using various voi: Text mit verschiedenen Stimmen und Einstellungen in Sprache umwandeln.
Create backups and restore from previous: Sicherungen erstellen und von vorherigen Sicherungen wiederherstellen.
Delete the audios after the conversion.
Drag your .pth file and .index file into: Ziehen Sie Ihre .pth-Datei und .index-Datei in diesen Bereich. Ziehen Sie eine und dann die andere.
Duration of the fade between audio chunk: Duration of the fade between audio chunks to prevent clicks. Higher values create smoother transitions but may increase latency.
Enables Voice Activity Detection to only: Enables Voice Activity Detection to only process audio when you are speaking, saving CPU.
Enter the text you want to convert to sp: Geben Sie den Text ein, den Sie in Sprache umwandeln möchten.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific inp: For ASIO drivers, selects a specific input channel. Leave at -1 for default.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific mon: For ASIO drivers, selects a specific monitor output channel. Leave at -1 for default.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific out: For ASIO drivers, selects a specific output channel. Leave at -1 for default.
For WASAPI (Windows), gives the app excl: For WASAPI (Windows), gives the app exclusive control for potentially lower latency.
I agree to the terms of use: I agree to the terms of use
If the number is greater than or equal t: If the number is greater than or equal to three, employing median filtering on the collected tone results has the potential to decrease respiration.
Influence exerted by the index file; a h: Influence exerted by the index file; a higher value corresponds to greater influence. However, opting for lower values can help mitigate artifacts present in the audio.
Language settings have been saved. Pleas: Spracheinstellungen wurden gespeichert. Bitte starten Sie die Anwendung neu, um die Änderungen zu übernehmen.
Male voice models typically use 155.0 an: Male voice models typically use 155.0 and female voice models typically use 255.0.
Model used for learning speaker embeddin: Model used for learning speaker embedding.
Move files to custom embedder folder: Move files to custom embedder folder
Note: You need to restart the applicatio: Hinweis: Sie müssen die Anwendung neu starten, damit die Sprachänderungen wirksam werden.
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Pitch extraction algorithm to use for the audio conversion. The default algorithm is rmvpe, which is recommended for most cases.
Play a sound when notifications are show: Einen Ton abspielen, wenn Benachrichtigungen angezeigt werden.
Please ensure compliance with the terms: Please ensure compliance with the terms and conditions detailed in [this document](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) before proceeding with your realtime.
Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Safeguard distinct consonants and breathing sounds to prevent electro-acoustic tearing and other artifacts. Pulling the parameter to its maximum value of 0.5 offers comprehensive protection. However, reducing this value might decrease the extent of protection while potentially mitigating the indexing effect.
Save debug logs to file for troubleshoot: Debug-Protokolle zur Fehlerbehebung in Datei speichern.
Select the backing vocals index file to: Select the backing vocals index file to use for the conversion.
Select the backing vocals model to use f: Select the backing vocals model to use for the conversion.
Select the deeecho model to use for the: Select the deeecho model to use for the separation.
Select the default format for audio outp: Wählen Sie das Standardformat für die Audioausgabe.
Select the denoise model to use for the: Select the denoise model to use for the separation.
Select the dereverb model to use for the: Select the dereverb model to use for the separation.
Select the device for monitoring your vo: Select the device for monitoring your voice (e.g., your headphones).
Select the device to use for the convers: Select the device to use for the conversion. 0 to ∞ separated by - and for CPU leave only an -
Select the device where the final conver: Select the device where the final converted voice will be sent (e.g., a virtual cable).
Select the font size for the application: Wählen Sie die Schriftgröße für die Anwendung.
Select the format to export the audio.
Select the index file to use for the con: Select the index file to use for the conversion.
Select the karaoke model to use for the: Select the karaoke model to use for the separation.
Select the language you want to use for: Wählen Sie die Sprache für die Anwendungsoberfläche.
Select the level of detail for debug log: Wählen Sie das Detailniveau für Debug-Protokolle.
Select the microphone or audio interface: Select the microphone or audio interface you will be speaking into.
Select the primary color for the applica: Wählen Sie die Primärfarbe für die Anwendung.
Select the vocals model to use for the s: Select the vocals model to use for the separation.
Select the voice model to use for the co: Select the voice model to use for the conversion.
Wählen Sie die Stimme für TTS.
Select your preferred language for the a: Wählen Sie Ihre bevorzugte Sprache für die Anwendungsoberfläche.
Set how often to automatically clean tem: Legen Sie fest, wie oft temporäre Dateien automatisch bereinigt werden.
Set the autotune strength - the more you: Set the autotune strength - the more you increase it the more it will snap to the chromatic grid.
Set the batch size for the separation.
Set the damping of the reverb.
Set the dry gain of the reverb.
Set the maximum file size for audio proc: Legen Sie die maximale Dateigröße für die Audioverarbeitung fest.
Set the maximum number of threads for pr: Legen Sie die maximale Anzahl von Threads für die Verarbeitung fest.
Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Set the pitch of the audio, the higher the value, the higher the pitch.
Set the room size of the reverb.
Set the wet gain of the reverb.
Set the width of the reverb.
Show Discord rich presence when the appl: Discord-Rich-Presence anzeigen, wenn die Anwendung läuft.
Specify the output file name (optional,: Geben Sie den Ausgabedateinamen an (optional, Standard ist tts_output.wav)
Split the audio into chunks for inferenc: Split the audio into chunks for inference to obtain better results in some cases.
Substitute or blend with the volume enve: Substitute or blend with the volume envelope of the output. The closer the ratio is to 1, the more the output envelope is employed.
The path where the output audio will be: The path where the output audio will be saved, by default in audio_files/rvc/output.wav
Geben Sie hier Ihren Text ein...
Volume level below which audio is treate: Volume level below which audio is treated as silence and not processed. Helps to save CPU resources and reduce background noise.
